note: Wild Monkey is a branding and marketing agency that helps good brands become great. Our philosophy is simple: Be Seen. Be Heard. Be Loud! We approach each project with the mindset of the Three Wise Monkeys – Mizaru, Kikazaru, and Iwazaru – see no evil, hear no evil, speak no evil. Instead, we keep our eyes peeled for new opportunities, our ears perked for the latest trends, and our voices howling your brand’s message from the highest tree.
